Author: FideliaDelarosa
Text: I know that when in treatment, if you throw up more than 2 times pr week they need to check your blood tests. I have gotten zink and b12 prescribed, but I think you need a lot more. Also the electrolytes are in risk, so probably sodium and potassium!  If you get your blood tests done with out supplements, you will know what you need though!  Best of luck - and make sure to find out what you are lacking so you stay safe! Xx
